title: Health observations log
description: Each entry describes a chronic or acute health event observed in time.

observation_date_id.description: YYYYMMDD formatted date when event was observed/recorded.

observation_time.description: HH:MM:SS formatted time of when event was observed/recorded.

body_site_code.description: This enumeration includes all codes from FHIR's body-site definition http://hl7.org/fhir/ValueSet/body-site.

diagnosis_id.description: Reference to the diagnosis causing the observed symptoms.

new_occurance.description: True if event is new and not observed in past 7 days.
